metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20572 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: In verity_target of dm-verity-target.c, there is a possible way to modifyread-only files due to a missing permission check. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. Userinteraction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-234475629References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
